HERO.TITLE: Professional Home Services
HERO.SUBTITLE: We provide high-quality services for your home

SERVICES.TITLE: Our Services
SERVICES.SUBTITLE: We offer a wide range of professional home services

ELECTRICITY.TITLE: Electrical Services
ELECTRICITY.SHORT_DESC: Professional electrical services for your home
ELECTRICITY.FULL_DESC: Our team of certified electricians provides comprehensive electrical services including installation, repair, and maintenance for residential properties. We ensure safety and reliability in all our electrical work.

PLUMBING.TITLE: Plumbing Services
PLUMBING.SHORT_DESC: Complete plumbing solutions for all needs
PLUMBING.FULL_DESC: Our plumbing services cover all aspects of home plumbing systems. From fixing leaks to installing new fixtures, our experienced plumbers deliver quality workmanship and reliable solutions.

PAINTING.TITLE: Painting Services
PAINTING.SHORT_DESC: Transform your space with professional painting
PAINTING.FULL_DESC: Our painting services help transform your living spaces with high-quality paints and expert application. We offer interior and exterior painting with attention to detail and perfect finishes.

DRAIN.TITLE: Drain Cleaning
DRAIN.FULL_DESC: Our drain cleaning services address all types of blockages and ensure proper water flow in your drainage systems. We use professional equipment and techniques to resolve even the most stubborn clogs.

CLEANING.TITLE: Cleaning Services
CLEANING.SHORT_DESC: Professional cleaning for sofas, carpets, and tanks
CLEANING.FULL_DESC: Our specialized cleaning services cover sofas, carpets, and water tanks. We use eco-friendly cleaning products and advanced equipment to ensure thorough cleaning and sanitization.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Get in touch with our team
